original_text: Long ago, Enoch also spoke about those false teachers. Enoch belonged to the seventh family that was born, starting with Adam. He said, ‘Look, the Lord will come with many thousands of his own angels.
korean_text: 아담의 칠대 손 에녹이 이 사람들에 대하여도 예언하여 이르되 보라 주께서 그 수만의 거룩한 자와 함께 임하셨나니

sentences.original_text: Enoch belonged to the seventh family
that was born, starting with Adam
He said, 'Look, the Lord will come
with many thousands of his own angels'
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 천천만 명의 천사들과 함께오실 것입니다'
